articles.title: 100,000 Pfizer vaccine doses 'thrown away' after faulty PHE guidance, doctors claim - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Some healthcare staff may have been unaware that advice on vial capacity had changed
articles.content:
More than 100,000 doses of the Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine may have been thrown away because of incorrect guidance by Public Health England, it has been revealed.
